amendment.description: An amendment numbered 150 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to strike references to China in lines 18 and 19 on page 132.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
